overview: Four years of Party Goj 고조 Mudeok,  The Moorim First Witch, "White Ox," attacked.  The Eyepung that sent the whole family away.  He sharpens his exploits with a bloody grudge.  It is not enough to deal with the "white bull" who has the legendary monumental lotus flower in his hand.  Indeed, will the strong 'Ear Poong' be able to prevent the 'White Ox' from flooding and succeed in revenge?  A full moon night,  Awaken the absolute warrior to rule the Gang!
title: The Death of A Enchantress
